concept.title: Geo IP
concept.shortdesc: The Geo IP processor provides geographic location information for IP addresses. Geo IP uses the Maxmind GeoIP2 database to provide geolocation information.

conbody.draft-comment: Do they have to have their own geoIP2 database file?
conbody.p: To use the Geo IP processor, you specify one or more IP address input fields, name the corresponding output field, and specify the geolocation information that you want.

Geo IP can provide the following geolocation information for each IP address.
Country name
Country ISO code
City name
Latitude
Longitude
